description: Started my journey in the world of programming, I started studying JAVA and I created my app.
I enrolled in a technical course in Information Technology, where I further developed my programming skills and was introduced to the world of web development.
I finished my technical course and started a college degree in Systems Analysis and Development to enhance my professional level.
I began an internship at a company called KeyLabs as a Full Stack developer, using Ionic and Node.js frameworks, and after three months, I was promoted to Junior Developer.
I transitioned to a company called Kron Digital, where I work exclusively as a Frontend developer, using Angular and React frameworks.
I finished my college degree in Systems Analysis and Development.
